summary: Google Maps API Externs Missing visualRefresh Property

comments.content:
The visualRefresh property is missing from the maps API externs: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/basics

I'm not sure who has been submitting these externs lately.
Seems like they are deprecating the "visualRefresh" but will add it back for older externs.
They are deprecating it, but not until November. I can patch it it, but since those are dynamically generated it would just be overwritten.
This issue was closed by revision 561f18d01dc7.
This issue was closed by revision 561f18d01dc7.
